arm_group.description: Patient with a clinical diagnosis of Uveitis.

brief_summary.textblock:
This study is aimed at investigating the long term clinical outcome of patients with
      uveitis.

detailed_description.textblock:
Patients will be included if they are treated for uveitis and have had repeat follow-up.
      Data will be gathered from the entire length of the patients follow-up.

      The main outcome measures will be:

      Change from baseline of Best corrected visual acuity (BCVA)at 10 years Causes of vision loss
      (≤6/15, VL) and severe vision loss (≤6/60, SVL) at 10 years Number of clinical visits at 10
      years.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Clinical Diagnosis of Uveitis.

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  No follow-up data.

study_pop.textblock: Patient data will be gathered from the uveitis clinic at Moorfields Eye Hospital.

clinical_study.official_title: Clinical Outcome and Causes of Visual Loss in Uveitis

overall_official.affiliation: Moorfields Eye Hospital NHS Foundation Trust

primary_outcome.description: Recorded repeat best corrected visual acuity at intervals throughout the length of follow-up.

reference.citation: Rothova A, Suttorp-van Schulten MS, Frits Treffers W, Kijlstra A. Causes and frequency of blindness in patients with intraocular inflammatory disease. Br J Ophthalmol. 1996 Apr;80(4):332-6.

Bodaghi B, Cassoux N, Wechsler B, Hannouche D, Fardeau C, Papo T, Huong DL, Piette JC, LeHoang P. Chronic severe uveitis: etiology and visual outcome in 927 patients from a single center. Medicine (Baltimore). 2001 Jul;80(4):263-70. No abstract available.

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: Moorfields Eye Hospital NHS Foundation Trust

secondary_outcome.description: Record any ocular changes related to permanent visual loss under 6/12 and severe visual loss under 6/60.

clinical_study.source: Moorfields Eye Hospital NHS Foundation Trust

lead_sponsor.agency: Moorfields Eye Hospital NHS Foundation Trust

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Cohort, Time Perspective: Retrospective
